data.title: Monster Voice
data.meta_description: 40s - Smooth, sophisticated, richly textured Scottish voice. Expressive, warm and trustworthy. Laura is a well-known face in television and film. Notable roles include Kate in A KNIGHT'S TALE, Lydia in BREAKING BAD and BETTER CALL SAUL and Cat in LIP SERVICE. Further credits include PETER AND WENDY alongside Stanley Tucci, HOUNDINI AND DOYLE, BBC series ONE OF US and ITV's THE LOCH, UKTV detective series TRACES, BBC's THE PACT, and Irvine Welsh's CRIME for Britbox. Laura has also voiced both video games and TV documentaries, including the recent NBC Sports documentary, THE COURSE AND THE TOWN.
data.text:
Back to voices

40s - Smooth, richly textured Scottish voice. Expressive, warm and trustworthy.

Laura is a well-known face in television and film. Notable roles include Kate in A KNIGHT’S TALE, Lydia in BREAKING BAD and BETTER CALL SAUL and Cat in LIP SERVICE. Further credits include PETER AND WENDY alongside Stanley Tucci, HOUNDINI AND DOYLE, BBC series ONE OF US and ITV’s THE LOCH, UKTV detective series TRACES, BBC’s THE PACT, and Irvine Welsh’s CRIME for Britbox. Laura has also voiced both video games and TV documentaries, including the recent NBC Sports documentary, THE COURSE AND THE TOWN.
